definition: hostile/malevolence/antagonism/to view as enemy/to stand against
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
to look at/to regard/to inspect
old variant of 視|视[shi4]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: However, sach a cooperation aroused fear and hostility of the United States and other Western powers.
sentences.chinese: 同时也引起了美国等西方大国的惊恐和敌视。

sentences.english: Why are the two Koreas so hostile?
sentences.chinese: 为什么两个朝鲜竟会如此敌视？

sentences.english: All the buzz lately is that the Obama administration is “antibusiness.
sentences.chinese: 最近所有的杂音是奥巴马政府“对企业持敌视态度”。

sentences.english: Stay calm and avoid the appearance of hostility or personal rejection.
sentences.chinese: 保持沉著和避免显露出敌视或个人的鄙弃。

sentences.english: Many people say my story is too sad. Yes, that is true.
sentences.chinese: 《我们彼此敌视》是个悲哀的故事，不得善终。

sentences.english: They also carry 4) surfboards and have 5)attitudes.
sentences.chinese: 他们也带著冲浪板，表现出敌视态度。

sentences.english: N. Korea gets hostile, then S. Korea and Vietnam get hostile to China.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜变的富有敌意，然后韩国和越南开始敌视中国。

sentences.english: Mr Obama must dispatch the canard that he is hostile to the Jewish state.
sentences.chinese: 他还必须解除他敌视犹太人国家的流言。

sentences.english: Their views have also generally been hostile to Indonesia's Christians.
sentences.chinese: 在他们的观点中，通常也会敌视印尼的基督徒。

definition: to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
enmity/hostility
hostile/enemy (factions)/combative
to hate/hatred/enmity/hostility
to loathe/to despise/contempt
to hate out of jealousy/to resent
to detest/hatred
to be afraid of the consequences/restraining fear
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
to loathe/to hate/to abhor/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 e4]
to hate evil/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 wu4]
to incite disharmony/to instigate
to provoke/provocation
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary
to loathe/to hate/disgusted with sth
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
hate (due to envy etc)
